DzNumericPropertyWgt Class Reference
[Interface Components]

Widget for displaying/manipulating a DzIntProperty or DzFloatProperty. More...

Detailed Description

Widget for displaying/manipulating a DzIntProperty or DzFloatProperty.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzNumericPropertyWgt::MapDisplay

The various modes that determine when the image menu is displayed in the interface

Enumerator:
PropertyDependent 

Image menu is displayed depending on the properties added to the widget

AlwaysDisplayMap 

Image menu is always displayed regardless of the properties added to the widget

NeverDisplayMap 

Image menu is always hidden regardless of the properties added to the widget

enum DzNumericPropertyWgt::NumericLayout

The layout states for the DzNumericPropertyWgt widget

Enumerator:
NLNonMappable 

The properties for the widget can not be mapped, the widget should hide any components for mapping.

NLMapped 

The properties for the widget are mapped, the widget should show any components for mapping.

NLNotMapped 

The properties for the widget are not mapped, the widget should show any components for setting a map.

NLNeedsMap 

The properties for the widget are not mapped and the property value is invalid without a map, the widget should show only components for setting a map.
